original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(3581)@  武將身旁湧出大水，對周圍敵人造成$Skill_Str(3581)@武力傷害與$Skill_Int(3581)@智力傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(3581)@ Water gushes out next to the general, causing $Skill_Str(3581)@武力 damage and $Skill_Int(3581)@智力 damage to the surrounding enemies.
